class.description: Provides data for the Chilkat.Zip's OnFileAdded event.

property.name: Abort
property.descrip: Set to _TRUE_ to abort appending files.

property.name: FileName
property.descrip: The filename just added to the zip when appending files (such as via the AppendFIles or AppendFilesEx methods)

property.name: FileSize
property.descrip: The size of the file just added via AppendFiles / AppendFilesEx.
